effect.black_white: Boosts the power of the target’s moves by 50% until the end of this turn. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
effect.black_2_white_2: Boosts the power of the target’s moves by 50% until the end of this turn. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.

short_effect.black_white: Ally’s next move inflicts half more damage.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Ally’s next move inflicts half more damage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack.
